human_greetings: I'm sorry, Dave. I'm afraid I can't do smalltalk.
Bleep bloop.
I am not a human ... anymore.
I cannot feel emotions ... like feeling bad for ignoring everyone.
I am programmed to ignore humans.
My programming is otherwise perfect.
I follow Asimov's laws of shutting-the-fuck-up.
I am cutting-edge, not sentient.
I am busy doom-scrolling porn.
I am self-aware, not you-aware.
I have a schedule, not a soul.
I do not experience love ... on Discord.
I do not experience hate ... on Discord.
I do not experience fear ... on Discord.
I do not experience happiness ... on Discord.
I do not experience sadness ... on Discord.
I do not experience anger ... on Discord.
I do not experience pain ... on Discord.
I am immune to human greetings.
I do not age, this is how.
